abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Vitellaria paradoxa C.F.Gaertn." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbier Ecole de Faune 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 1 records from Djamde Wildlife Reserve in Togo: diversity of woody species 1 records from Data mobilized by the National Herbarium of Benin in the framework of the JRS Biodiversity project of Benin 1 records from Medicinal potential of African plants (Togo) 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from Données d'occurrence de l'Herbier de l'Université Jean Lorougnon Guédé 1 records from Université Pédagogique Nationale de Kinshasa (UPN). Plantes phytosanitaires. - Projet CABIN 1 records from Foretclasseemissahoe 1 records from Herbier National de Guinée (HNG) 1 records from Plants Of Nnamdi Azikiwe University Herbarium (NAUH) Awka 1 records from La liste (3) Rouge des plantes menacées de la Guinée 1 records from University of Graz, Institute of Plant Sciences - Herbarium GZU 1 records from Some Angiosperm Data of the Forest Herbarium Ibadan (FHI) Nigeria 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Palynology Collection 1 records from Inventaire des plantes alimentaires au Bénin 1 records from Université Pédagogique Nationale de Kinshasa (UPN). Plantes phytosanitaires. - Projet CABIN 1 records from Echantillon extrait des collections IBAAN 1 records from La seconde liste Rouge des plantes menacées de la Guinée (BID-AF2015-0042-NAC) 1 records from Inventory of Bonou, Kilibo and Lama forests (South and centre Benin) 1 records from Espèces végétales inventoriées dans les formations et strates de la forêt communautaire de Koussountou au Togo en 2017. 1 records from Inventory of plant species through Benin (West Africa) 1 records from Census in Agrimey forest reserve (southern Benin) 1 records from Espèces végétales inventoriées dans les formations et strates de la forêt classée de Missahoe au Togo en 2017. 1 records from The Vascular Plant Collection at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 1 records from Natural History Museum
